alert.note: Alert for Aiken; Edgefield; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 3:33PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Edgefield, northwestern Aiken and southwestern Saluda Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 333 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Edgefield, or 15 miles north of Belvedere, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Edgefield, Johnston, Ridge Spring, Saluda County Airport, Edgefield County Airport, Monetta, Trenton, Ward, Strom Thurmond High School, Harmony, Mt Vintage and Edgefield Federal Correction Institution. This includes Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 24 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
